SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class GoldCardCornerTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.GoldCardCornerTest
public class GoldCardCornerTest extends Object
JUnit test class for testing the functionalities of GoldCardCorner. This test class sets up a scenario with a GoldDeck, PlayerField, and various ResourceCards, then tests different methods of GoldCardCorner for correctness.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp() throws JsonLoadException, InvalidSymbolException
      Sets up the initial state for each test case by initializing a GoldDeck, PlayerField, and placing several ResourceCards on the field.
      Throws:
      JsonLoadException - if there's an issue loading JSON data.
      InvalidSymbolException - if an invalid symbol is encountered.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Cleans up the resources after each test case by resetting goldDeck and field to null.

    • getRequirementsTest

      public void getRequirementsTest() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the GoldCard.getRequirements(boolean) method of GoldCardCorner. Verifies that requirements are retrieved correctly for both active and inactive states.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if there's an issue with player-related exceptions.

    • checkRequirementsTest

      public void checkRequirementsTest() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the GoldCard.checkRequirements(PlayerField, boolean) method of GoldCardCorner. Verifies that requirements checking works correctly for both active and inactive states.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if there's an issue with player-related exceptions.

    • getCornerTest

      public void getCornerTest() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the PlayableCard.getCorner(CornerPosition, boolean) method of GoldCardCorner. Verifies that corners are retrieved correctly for both active and inactive states.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if there's an issue with player-related exceptions.

    • getSymbolsOnSideTest

      public void getSymbolsOnSideTest() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the PlayableCard.getSymbolsOnSide(boolean) method of GoldCardCorner. Verifies that symbols on the side are retrieved correctly for both active and inactive states.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if there's an issue with player-related exceptions.

    • getKingdomTest

      public void getKingdomTest() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the PlayableCard.getKingdom() method of GoldCardCorner. Verifies that the kingdom symbol is retrieved correctly.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if there's an issue with player-related exceptions.

    • getScorePerCornerTest

      public void getScorePerCornerTest() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the GoldCardCorner.getScorePerCorner() method of GoldCardCorner. Verifies that the score per corner is calculated correctly.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if there's an issue with player-related exceptions.

    • calcScoreTest

      public void calcScoreTest() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the GoldCardCorner.calcScore(PlayerField, boolean, Position) method of GoldCardCorner. Verifies that the score calculation is correct for different positions on the field.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if there's an issue with player-related exceptions.

      public void toStringTest() throws InvalidSymbolException
      Throws:
